reviewText: This is an awesome movie just had to have it

I have long loved this movie.  It's a pretty typical adventure movie, with fairly atypical actors who seem to really enjoy working together.  Geena Davis and Samuel L. Jackson have a lovely onscreen chemistry.  Not an epic masterpiece, but a seriously fun little movie.
Geena Davis can beat me up anytime, action movie at it's finest and would rate higher today than most new releases worth viewing
Exciting, even though far-fetched.  A good solid pop-corn movie.
Absolutely friggin' love this movie. Highly entertaining which is exactly the point. My favorite Geena Davis movie and one of my favorite Sam Jackson movies.

The worst movie I've ever seen.
The script is so unreal that it makes you say "Boooohhhh!!!" after 10 minutes of watching it.
Don't waste your valuable money in this crap.
Awesome service and product thank you
